website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for serving, preparing, and storing coffee or liquor.
pros: Multiple features that give this cart the edge over the competition including a towel holder, wine rack, cabinet,  and glass rack
Plus, loads of surface for prep work
cons: At 40 pounds, this is one of the heavier carts on our list

website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, sturdy, feature-packed cart that's a great addition to your home if you entertain a lot.
pros: Storage for all kinds of beverage or food service – wine, cocktails, beer, tea, dessert, etc
Has a towel rack and even space for a mini fridge in the cabinet
cons: Heavier and bulkier than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: ... also hesitate to buy this but this was soooo pretty beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: As all people i also hesitate to buy this but this was soooo pretty beautiful!! Prettier than the picture! I got little confuse with the instruction but i got a help with my man, the packaging was good, this came with no chip whatsoever, very sturdy, a little heavy but i can still move it. That's prob all! No problems so far..
customer_reviews.author: Kathrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I watched an entire 3 hour movie while I assembled it; even though the movie was long, time flew by. Directions were fairly easy to follow. SOOO worth it!! It's a beautiful addition to my home :)
customer_reviews.author: Champ

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: ......UPDATED......So my first review was I just started building the mini bar and the wood screws provided are to soft and strip VERY easily. The tension you need to actually put them in is the problem. I'm highly upset because I was really excited for this product. UPDATE I was able to get the stripped screws in other means. I would not recommend using the giving Allen wrench if you have stright screw drive style Allen keys would be better especially for the first 2 screws. After the first tow everything else was fine and was able to huild without issues. the final product when finish is actually pretty nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daksby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We love this cart! It is a very nice piece of furniture and is a perfect addition to our dining room area. You can lock the wheels so it stays in place which is a great feature. You can choose not to stock your wine glasses to get additional space for bottles, which is what we did.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bar Cart
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly impressed with how well everything was packaged. All the pieces came in two boxes inside a very thick, supportive box. Each piece was wrapped with foam cellophane and every piece was free of damage or imperfections. The instructions could have been a little better but I had no issues. It took me about 3 hours to put it together. My one complaint is that the drawer fits extremely tight. I might have to sand the inside of the drawer for a looser fit, but that's okay because no one will see from that angle. I am very impressed with the quality and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bar yesterday and put it together. It took me about two hours but I was also doing other things. All of the parts came in the box and the instructions were easy to read. Once it was put together, I arranged our various bar things on it and was very pleased with the overall look. It rolled very easily even with several heavy bottles on it. It is a very dark brown. This was the cheapest one I found so I was concerned about quality, but it is very heavy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S.

customer_reviews.title: very nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: A great mini-bar, sturdy & good looking materials, and a breeze to put together - I'd recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: danseassembly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cart. I originally bought to put small kitchen appliances on as I had seen someone else do. That did not work for me. But, it is so pretty that I put it in the corner of my dining room and use the drawer and little door area for storage. Cookbooks etc. When I got it I had a friend come over and we laid all the parts out and did a check to make sure no damage and all parts were there. Did not take long to put together.
customer_reviews.author: PLB OKC

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The good: Inexpensive. Lots of storage. Looks good from a distance. I assembled it by myself (would be easier and quicker with a second set of hands) The bad: particle board that will crumble/crack if you over tighten even a quarter turn. The color is much darker than the picture. Its closer to black than a medium/dark brown. The small screws need a very small screwdriver which requires alot of hand turning.
customer_reviews.author: Devansh Patel

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: great bar cart! holds 6-8 hanging wine glasses depending on their size, tons of bottles, room in the drawer for assorted drink making tools, and the cabinet holds extra glasses , shakers , etc. Pus the handle can be used as a towel rack. And the wheels lock on one end to keep it still. I put a waterproof mat on the top to prevent spills from damaging the wood. That's the only thing I think they could improve on. Maybe supply a bar mat for the top. But plenty of room on top for an ice bucket and mixing drinks, even a small cutting board for limes ! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Fits soooo much booze!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of booze. After looking at different bar storage furniture for a year I decided to buy this because it was cheap. Wow! I’m so impressed with this little cart. There is so much storage and it holds soooo many bottles of liquor. I would highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chipper

customer_reviews.title: Cute with a few kinks
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little cart, I just had 2 issues with it. 1- the instructions are decent but none of the wood pieces were labeled and many of them are similar looking. I had trouble identifying some pieces and actually assembled part of the cart incorrectly from this mix up and had to backtrack and start over. Here’s a hint - if a piece is missing holes the instructions say should be there, do not power drill those holes in (whoops). 2- my Italian 18 oz wine glasses do not fit in the wine glass holders because the bases are not completely flat, which was a little frustrating, but my smaller 14 oz glasses fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: Just the right fit
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions are exactly as stated and simple to put together; however, I had to stop at local hardware store to get another wood screw as one them had excess material inside the head that would not allow the tool to fit in order to tighten (reason for 4 stars). All of the larger wood screws had the hexagon head which takes a bit of time. Would have been easier if they were normal screws so you can drill. I like the color and the look. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly SA

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: The cart came out good after assembly. There was a minor setback where some of the holes that the screw goes in, weren't deep enough. I had to use a power drill to get the screws to tighten all the way through. Using a screwdriver did not get the screws to go all the way through. Just bare that in mind when assembling. Other than that, the cart fit what i needed to put on there and it was small enough to fit in the open spot perfectly. For the price, this looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: thai son

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mini bar. All wood no pressed cardboard. Assembly was a breeze with a ratchet and a drill. Packaging was very well put together and the pieces were well protected. Definitely worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Koalminer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good-looking bar cart worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I had read good reviews on this bar cart and decided to order it for our dining room. We needed a simple cart with extra storage. The rolling castors is a plus. It arrived promptly packaged well. Assembly was fairly easy for one person; did take 3 hours and a lot of wrist power for all the screws! That time included me checking off pieces before beginning-I’m meticulous about putting items together correctly the first time. The finish is nice, the cart sturdy and the look great! We are happy to have this cart and love the cost for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy mini bar
customer_reviews.text: Great after assembly. Was missing parts but Winsome sent missing parts quickly. Assembly was time consuming but worth the finished product. Sturdy and has great storage for a mini bar. Definitely recommend. Winsome had great customer service, very responsive and quick to ship one part.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: extremely hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cart now that it's built but it is not easy to put together. The allen wrench they give you didn't fit all the screw heads correctly so I ended up stripping a few. The screws also install at awkward angles so you manually have to lift the allen wrench up every turn and reseat it. It took about 3 hours to build and was extrememly irritating. The product itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: lori snow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, and tons of room for plenty of items
customer_reviews.text: Although other reviews mentioned it was tough to assemble this item, I found that it was not too bad. It could probably use some more detail in the instructions but I was able to install it myself with a tiny tool kit I have. No power tools needed. It is very sturdy and the dark finish makes it look very nice. It is just what we were looking for to complete the room and store all of our drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Classy.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few hours to put together myself. The end result is just as you see in the photos. Love, love, love this item. Solid construction. Does not feel like it is about to fall apart when heavy bottles/glasses are placed on it. Very classy. Classes up the joint. Not sure why, but when I look at this with all my “bar stuff” on it, it brings me back to the times of prohibition. I imagine a dinner party in a secret location with this item being wheel around the dining table for a secret taste of a liquid that is a no no for the time. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cambar

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble. Parts do not contain letters
customer_reviews.text: I guess overall it's okay, but the assembly was a royal pain. The instructions list every item with a letter, great, EXCEPT none of the actual pieces have the letters on them, so I installed a few items wrong a couple times because they looked alike, but wasn't the correct piece to use at the time. Note to seller, if you are going to send Instructions including a letter per piece , this is A, this one K, this screw is x, this one X1, then you should actually mark the pieces as well. I could've had this done in 30 minutes instead of it taking upwards of 2 to 3 hours..
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our growing wine collection! I added drawer dividers for the drawer to put out wine stoppers, openers, and other “drinks” accessories. It took us about 20 minutes to put together. Would recommend to have a blanket or a carpet when putting the cart together to avoid the wood from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: bulldoggie04

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Jimmy Cart! And I don't fall in love easily but I am impressed with my new acquisition and so are my friends. It looks elegant and accents my house furniture well. Only problem I have is it took me 2 evenings though I assembled it while watching TV, enjoying a drink and between phone conversations (All in all, it probably took me a total of 3-4 hrs). The first few hours were for opening the box and identifying and marking each part with the letter as specified in the assembling instructions. Frankly, the assembling could have been easier if the parts had been labeled with stickers. .
customer_reviews.author: Fred K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks goos
customer_reviews.text: First off, this thing takes 2 people to assemble and it's pretty complicated. You'll need to screwdriver but a drill works much better. It's pretty sturdy, which also means it's pretty heavy as well. Looks good and strolls well once finished building.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: First One Arrived Broken But Solid Cart For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: First package arrived damaged. Took a while to get a replacement, but one arrived about a week later. Assembly is about 1.5-2 hours, but worth the work if you get a unit that isnt damaged and comes with all the parts. Not many other carts on the market this size so if you absolutely must roll the dice, YRMV.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hochstetler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CART!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is more than I expected. The rich, dark color matches perfectly with my chocolate-stained wood floors and the dark reclaimed wood throughout my condo. Although I would have liked one more row for the stemware, it still worked out well. The cart is sturdy, the drawer and cabinet doors open and close smoothly and lined up just as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: figuress

customer_reviews.title: A little tough to build, but great result
customer_reviews.text: Wow was this thing annoying to put together. I mean some parts were not the right ones, it needed some extra drilling, but it was nothing someone with a $30 amazon drill and some elbow grease can't handle. It still gets 5 stars because the final result is amazing, it looks just like the picture, possibly even better, and its functional in terms of rolling around and being stable and the drawer and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.text: I price watched this item for a long time and when it was finally low enough ($50) I purchased it. Totally worth the wait. It is an amazing bar cart and adds a nice touch to my apartment. Really high quality and easy to assemble. Some areas of assembly did take more than just myself, but I'm sure it could all be done by one person.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This cart turned out to be of much higher quality than expected. I figured it was the typical lightweight particle board but was pleased to find out it is actually heavy and durable. The instructions weren't great but it's also not a very complex piece to assemble. I would absolutely recommend this product. My only complaint is the wine bottle slots are fairly wide, so narrower bottles will fall through and need to be placed on the bottom rack. It however does not warrant a reduction in rating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Really the only complaint I have about this cart is that it's packed so securely that it takes almost an hour to get everything fully unboxed. I guess I shouldn't complain seeing as how the item was flawless after taking everything out. It'll take you probably 2 hours to assemble this. It's sturdy and has a decent amount of space to store your liquor and wine. For around $100 you really can't go wrong with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome it allow me to put so many thing everyday used like coffee makers and many others, we love it. My husband said its very easy to assemble..
customer_reviews.author: Ruati Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Mostly okay.
customer_reviews.text: It holds plenty of bottles, 6 wine glasses, 6 bottles of wine, and has an cupboard on the bottom where we keep soda. The drawer handle never fit, the hole we’re drilled incorrectly. Definitely couldn’t roll it across the room, but sturdy enough to hold everything in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy if you're looking for a wine/tea station that's not too big. Fits perfectly in a corner. The material seems to be made of durable materials. The small cabinet underneath the wine is enough for me to store me tea. This is enough for a small collection of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Khai Pham

customer_reviews.title: Best value for price barcart
customer_reviews.text: Looked forever for a barcart. I hated all of them and they were all overpriced. Then I found this one. This thing is amazing; it holds spirits, it holds glasses, it holds wine, it's got storage, it's got a towel rack, it's got extra storage. Come on people, what else would you want? My one grievance is that it took FOREEEEEEVER to put together. No joke... 4 hours. But it's been with me for 5 years now and two apartments. Would buy again if mine were ever destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and made. I do wish the top shelf was longer since the rounded ends cost you room. I planned on 6 decanters but only room for 4.
customer_reviews.author: Baddog

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this product a 5 star rating. As it was easy to assemble, instructions were a little hard to understand at first, but we figured it out. The installment was unnecessary, and it was fun to build. The finished built product is aesthetic to the eye. But a few of the pieces were damaged upon arrival. Such as a piece of the board to the cabinet had some scratches, the drawer door was chipped at the corner, which is visible from the front. But overall we are happy with how it looks in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful. I bought it for our screened in lanai ...
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. I bought it for our screened in lanai in Florida, but when I got it I realized it is solid wood so not weather proof. So, I just rearranged the room so it was by the house and not near the screens. It is quality for the money. Very nice looking. And goes together well.
customer_reviews.author: jlc-florida

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Other than pain in the butt instructions, this thing surprised me! Feels sterdy and holds a bunch! The wine slots are a bit too wide though, most bottles are smaller and slip through. I’ll probably rig something to make it work!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wallace-Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I do expect that there will be a certain degree of difficulty in assembly if the product is of good quality! By difficulty, I mean, detailed steps. Totally WORTH the extra bit of effort! All of the parts fit perfectly, the wood is great quality and it looks beautiful!! I’m so, so happy with this product and have recommended It to others. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hayworth

customer_reviews.title: The metal rods that you see, sometimes they pop ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal rods that you see, sometimes they pop out of the pre-drilled holes. I had to use gorilla glue to get some to stick in there. Also, the wine rack holders- they don't hold your traditional 750ml bottle of wine. Had to buy self seal pipe insulation to make the rods larger so that it makes the gaps smaller. Not ideal, but I'm certainly not trying to break this all down and send back. A little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Power

customer_reviews.title: Nice little "bar"
customer_reviews.text: Good little "bar" overall. Took about an hour to assemble. Definitely have a helper! Looks good and build quality is sturdy. Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bar cart that’ll get you lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments every time guests come over! The directions are a bit confusing to follow but it should take about an hour to put together. The wood itself is pretty sturdy and the quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This bar was cheap and disappointing. The glass rack holder was over tightened and I had to remove the screw and redo it. The holes for the wooden dowels were either too big or too small. The stain had runs in several spots. The drawer does not fit in the slot, I had to take the tracks off and put in spacers. If it were not so much trouble to pack it up and send it back I would have. I spent too much time assembling it so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Will compliment any room or decor
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a medium size bar for a small to medium sized man cave, then this is it! Nice and compliments any decor. It will hold 4-5 750 liter bottles on the bottom rack.
customer_reviews.author: micki

customer_reviews.title: THE GOOD WITH THE BAD
customer_reviews.text: This was DIFFICULT to assemble. Wood screws that you had to use an alan wrench with. Very, very frustrating. Tiny places where your hands don't fit that need screws. A pain in the neck. BUT, I received so many compliments on the bar and it did look a lot more expensive than what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Jarosch

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol storage for dayz
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to put together, it's no IKEA assembly that's for sure. The shelves have a real solid feel to them and overal just a nice classy look (minus the mass amount of alcohol being stored on it). Even fully weighed down this thing rolls in and out of its slot on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: basel_thyme

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy. I use it as a side table for my bed and it’s easy to move and can carry all my needs
customer_reviews.author: Whitney H

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Nightmare to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Poor configuration of holes as there are several parts that do not fit as intended. This results in having to manipulate several areas just to make them fit and a much longer assembly time. Finally, there weren't any holes drilled into the bottom piece, as seen in pictures, for the metal rod to attach into. Looks like there's more work to be done before I can finally complete this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second cart , the first arrived damaged so I recieved another one within a couple weeks. The assembly of the cart was a little complicated, but I had help and I loved it after it was put together... Can't wait to stuck it and show off at my house warming party...
customer_reviews.author: Charyumyum

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice quality product. I use the top portion for a microwave, middle section for a mixer, and bottom for my crock pot. I didn’t install the metal rims and it still looks awesome! Shopped around for a long time before purchasing this for a great price. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: JayJayHal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: A piece came broken but he used gorilla glue to fix it. Took a while to assemble but the results were phenomenal! He absolutely loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cart
customer_reviews.text: I picked this beauty up when it was 50% off. Just a great overall cart. I put my Keurig on it, wine opener and of course all the liquor in the house. Was very easy to put together and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bar and sturdy wood and good look.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a hexagonal tool that is so difficult to operate due to the space and it just take too much time to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and quality of this. It's exactly what I thought it would be. Make sure to build this on top of a carpet. I built mine over tile and accidentally scratched the top piece
customer_reviews.author: Yuna Park

customer_reviews.title: READ THE DIRECTIONS... MAKES ASSEMBLY MUCH EASIER
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week, took 4 days to come with Amazon prime. Great purchase. Hour and a half for assembly. Best way was to organize all the pieces in alphabetical order. Made assembly much easier. Highly recommend. Nothing came damaged or chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: Really like the all round look of the cart. The drawer is a little tight opening and closing. Lots of Storage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jerdan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. It isnt the easiest to put together, but once you do, it looks great. It can hold quite a bit of alcohol and glassware.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoCoach

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Piece Upon Opening
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to put this cart together and have a new bar! However, upon opening the package, I found a very significant part had a large crack in it. Very disappointed that I have to wait a number of days for a replacement. Will change review once I receive the replacement and put the cart together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cocariu

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stylish, convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my boyfriend. He LOVED it. It's nice to have a central mini-bar location. Love the wine bottle storage. Unfortunately a lot of wine glass bases won't fit in the wine glass rack, so we don't really use that. But we get a lot of use from this guy anyway!
customer_reviews.author: CamilleElise

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart with lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This bat cart is amazing. I mainly got it because it had so many opportunities for storage. Our cart has 30 bottles on it and room for more without looking too crowded. I also have my mixing set, candy bowl, 6 stem glasses, shot glasses, mini shots, salt trimmer and a few other things in the cart. It was pretty easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and elegant!!! I bought it for my husband for the Christmas gift and just got it before Christmas, he absolutely loved it for his colectable liquors. We were looking for such a thing for years but they are either too pricy or ugly or too big. Its has very expensive look and match perfectly with his great collection. but it such a hastle to assemble it, very horrible instructions, it tool 2 hours to assemble but when is done you are just emazed.
customer_reviews.author: S.K

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about. Ez assembly took me 2 hours. I need more Booze
customer_reviews.author: Jerseygirl

customer_reviews.title: nice quality little cart
customer_reviews.text: Good real wood - nice little drawer and shelf, if this thing fits your space/looks its a solid little cart. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Perfect size for under age 30. Too small for years of stress that comes with my 57 yrs of life, I need a semi truck size! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. It was simple to put together. It is very sturdy and does not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: t boyd

customer_reviews.title: we remodel our lobby
customer_reviews.text: we just completed a remodel in the lobby at work and I wanted it to match the other furniture. It is a good sturdy piece of furniture yes I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bar 4 years ago and it's still standing strong. It's the cutest addition to any kitchen or dining room. Just recently we ended up taking the wheels off to make it look more permanent. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Streeter

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cart is perfect, looks so much better in person. Took roughly a hour to put it together, even though we were missing page 2 of the parts list. But we figured it out. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Raena Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Drink Cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is super sturdy and perfect for my need. It has a very elegant and graceful look and adds so much to my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! It fits everything and was pretty easy to put together. There was one area that I had to maneuver the nail but other than that, super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took about 3 hrs. but since I'm 74 yrs old don't think everyone will take that long. Cart is sturdy and looks just like photo on Amazon. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: whettphartt

customer_reviews.title: Solid little cart
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the entire top shelf of my pantry plus glass storage for all my favorite beverages. Easy to assemble if you have some room to spread out, sturdy and with plenty of room for your favorite bottles and glasses. Looks very nice in the office!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is a totally awesome little cart that holds alot. Its sturdy and durable. I have to say at first I was intimidated once I open the package and saw all the little screws and pieces but I was able to put it together by myself within 2 hours. I am so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Takes alot of time & patience!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cart is very nice but a nightmare to put together. Where you must screw in screws there is never enough space to work with even with tiny hands. The Allen wrench supplied to turn screws must be turned at a very slow pace because there isn't enough room to turn it a full revolution. Took way too long to assemble but otherwise looks very nice assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Vernia A. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Assembly difficulty 3/10
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy bar cart we dont move it much so idk how it will hold up being moved often but great buy my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: James Von

customer_reviews.title: Good product, hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item was very hard to assemble but the final product is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shahla Yousefi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our little townhome! People always compliment it. It’s the perfect size and the color is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Hairstylist11

customer_reviews.title: Love it....
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mini bar. Great conversation piece at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I loved this mini bar for my new pad. Sturdy, beautiful finish , worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Thibs

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for mini bar!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this as a mini bar. Is is sturdy and a beautiful addition to our home. It would be easier to assemble, if pieces were marked with stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy... worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I think its perfect. Plenty of space in the drawer and cabinet. Yes the instructions are pretty confusing. If you were good with puzzles... it will be easy lol. I did it by myself an about an hour and 10 min
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hartsaw

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and give you enough space to have a small bar at home
customer_reviews.author: Toomaj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your home
customer_reviews.text: It is an easy to assemble item. It is perfect for the small spaces Houses. You can have all your favorite bottles and your glasses
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product I didn't give it a five star bc it came slightly damaged and was missing a few screw but I worked in a hardware store for a few years so it was quite easy to fix love the item noe.
customer_reviews.author: R.R

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took a few hours to assemble (by myself) but it's otherwise fantastic. I had no problems that some of the negative commenters posted about; the pieces were not flimsy and nothing was damaged upon arrival. The assembled unit is very sturdy and rolls around without any shaking or wobbling. I've loaded it up with plenty of bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Xerlia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to organize my liquour and qine and glasses. Excellent wood. Sturdy and solid. Instructuons are poor, but with studying the pictures, project is doable. Overall, I was happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, sturdy cart, 4 stars because assembling instruction is not fully illustrated, it took me close to 2 hours to have it assembled !
customer_reviews.author: True4all

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Materials were high quality (not like many cheap boards other assembled furniture use) and some of the parts were already partially assembled. Great for the price and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to spend a few hours putting this together, but well worth the time! A beautiful addition to my dinning room. It looks rich and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: NJGreatGal

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: The screw(X)and wood dowel(T) both the holes on handle(F) are cross-crossed and doesn’t fit also the wood alignment is not good there is a gap around cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: like my little wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little bar rack because it is a perfect size for my living room. it seems exactly the way that picture shows. its so cool that you can serve your little snack at the same time on it's counter. the only thing is that one of its pieces is broken but its still usable. I didn't return it since i knew i wouldn't move it a lot so it will be fine. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: lll

customer_reviews.title: Love my wine bar
customer_reviews.text: I love my new wine bar!!! It was a bit difficult to decipher how to put it together, if the bags with hardware were numbered would have been much easier. That being said, instructions state it is a 2 person job, but I was able to complete it by myself. Looks great in our home
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Small cart tons of storage !
customer_reviews.text: I Love that is has so much storage for a bar cart . Really Good quality for the price . Assembly was pretty simple but I gave it 4 stars bc I was missing about 6 screws but I made it work w other ones I had . I Love it you won’t be dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect parts
customer_reviews.text: The product was sent with incorrectly sized handles. Both the handle for the top drawer and the cabinet handle were not long enough to fit into the screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great mini bar!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great. Lots of storage space for wine, liquor, mixers, glasses, and drink accessories. Assembly may take a while as there are many pieces, however nothing complicated. Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.author: LT, Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is just as beautiful as the picture. Assembly requires a lot of flipping back and forth to make sure you have the right pieces, but all in all it was not at ALL the nightmare I thought it would be, as quoted from the other reviews. It is sturdy and rolls well on hardwood. Two wheels have locks that work fine.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I love diy stuff and I really enjoyed putting together this nice bar Helped me overcome the stay-home boredom. The mini bar is sturdy, good quality and easy/fun to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to buy !
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be hesitate . Totally worth to buy. doesn’t take very long time to assemble . It ends up perfectly . Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Parts & screws not labeled for easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing the quality and the installation was easy but it was tricky with some parts due to the parts and screws not labeled but pretty much need focus and make sure you try to take your time with the installation
customer_reviews.author: nas meshal

customer_reviews.title: Looks good when finished
customer_reviews.text: Looks good when finished. Pain in the ass to put together especially without power tools and a ratchet set. One piece was broken but was unnoticeable once built so I let it go.
customer_reviews.author: BW

product_meta.title: Winsome Trading, Inc. Jimmy Cart, Espreso
feature_bullets: Cart stores up to 6 bottles of wine
3 open shelves for serving and storage
